name: ButAtWhatCost?
description:
ButAtWhatCost?

What is BAWC? ButAtWhatCost is a game where you have to dodge pillars or anything that may get in your way and pickup useful orbs that can heal you or give you buffs.

Who asked?

I did.

Is this game still in development?

Yeah, I'm still working on it myself currently. You can send in feedback and I will try to make it a reality. I'm planning on updating the game once every week, you  can join our discord server(https://discord.gg/FUVRUtv3Cr)  for update  sneakpeaks and more.

How do I play?

To play, click the download button, it should make you download a .zip file.

Once it's done downloading, simply right click the .zip file and click extract here/all.

When it's done extracting, you should be able to go into the folder that it has created and open the ButAtWhatCost application.

Ohno! a bug!

Try restarting game. Close the current window and reopen the ButAtWhatCost application.

If restarting the game doesn't work, you can contact me personally on discord, ncg_#5022 OR via email, samncgg@gmail.com, and I will try my best to respond as soon as possible.
